medium: Inkjet print, collage, aluminum, and UV lacquer
text: A black and white image of human hands holding a wire mesh basket covered with collaged images of people of varying age and race and signage that reads “CHOOSE Life,” “1 PAPA, 1 MAMAN, Pour TOUS, les ENFANTS.” In the upper right is a pasted advertisement for a science fiction novel titled “Alien Quest” which features a topless man in a cornfield.
title: Alien Quest
